00047 class SIM_API cClassDescriptor : public cObject
00048 {
00049   public:
00051     enum {
00052         FD_ISARRAY = 0x01,    
00053         FD_ISCOMPOUND = 0x02, 
00054         FD_ISPOINTER = 0x04,  
00055         FD_ISCPOLYMORPHIC = 0x08, 
00056         FD_ISCOBJECT = 0x10,  
00057         FD_ISEDITABLE = 0x20, 
00058         FD_NONE = 0x0
00059     };
00060 
00061   private:
00062     std::string baseclassname;
00063     cClassDescriptor *baseclassdesc;
00064     int inheritancechainlength;
00065 
00066   protected:
00067     // utility functions for converting from/to strings
00068     static void long2string(long l, char *buf, int bufsize);
00069     static void ulong2string(unsigned long l, char *buf, int bufsize);
00070     static long string2long(const char *s);
00071     static unsigned long string2ulong(const char *s);
00072     static void bool2string(bool b, char *buf, int bufsize);
00073     static bool string2bool(const char *s);
00074     static void double2string(double d, char *buf, int bufsize);
00075     static double string2double(const char *s);
00076     static void enum2string(long e, const char *enumname, char *buf, int bufsize);
00077     static long string2enum(const char *s, const char *enumname);
00078     static void oppstring2string(const char *s, char *buf, int bufsize);
00079     static void oppstring2string(const opp_string& str, char *buf, int bufsize);
00080     static void oppstring2string(const std::string& str, char *buf, int bufsize);
00081     static void string2oppstring(const char *s, opp_string& str);
00082     static void string2oppstring(const char *s, std::string& str);
00083 
00084   public:
00087 
00091     cClassDescriptor(const char *classname, const char *_baseclassname=NULL);
00092 
00096     virtual ~cClassDescriptor();

00101 
00106     static cClassDescriptor *getDescriptorFor(const char *classname);
00107 
00113     static cClassDescriptor *getDescriptorFor(cPolymorphic *object);
00115 
00118 
00124     virtual bool doesSupport(cPolymorphic *obj) {return false;}
00125 
00129     virtual cClassDescriptor *getBaseClassDescriptor();
00130 
00135     int getInheritanceChainLength();
00136 
00143     virtual const char *getProperty(const char *propertyname) = 0;
00144 
00149     virtual int getFieldCount(void *object) = 0;
00150 
00156     virtual const char *getFieldName(void *object, int field) = 0;
00157 
00164     virtual unsigned int getFieldTypeFlags(void *object, int field) = 0;
00165 
00168     bool getFieldIsArray(void *object, int field) {return getFieldTypeFlags(object, field) & FD_ISARRAY;}
00169     bool getFieldIsCompound(void *object, int field) {return getFieldTypeFlags(object, field) & FD_ISCOMPOUND;}
00170     bool getFieldIsPointer(void *object, int field) {return getFieldTypeFlags(object, field) & FD_ISPOINTER;}
00171     bool getFieldIsCPolymorphic(void *object, int field) {return getFieldTypeFlags(object, field) & (FD_ISCPOLYMORPHIC|FD_ISCOBJECT);}
00172     bool getFieldIsCObject(void *object, int field) {return getFieldTypeFlags(object, field) & FD_ISCOBJECT;}
00173     bool getFieldIsEditable(void *object, int field) {return getFieldTypeFlags(object, field) & FD_ISEDITABLE;}
00175 
00179     virtual const char *getFieldDeclaredOn(void *object, int field);
00180 
00186     virtual const char *getFieldTypeString(void *object, int field) = 0;
00187 
00194     virtual const char *getFieldProperty(void *object, int field, const char *propertyname) = 0;
00195 
00200     virtual int getArraySize(void *object, int field) = 0;
00201 
00208     virtual bool getFieldAsString(void *object, int field, int i, char *buf, int bufsize) = 0;
00209 
00216     virtual bool setFieldAsString(void *object, int field, int i, const char *value) = 0;
00217 
00223     virtual const char *getFieldStructName(void *object, int field) = 0;
00224 
00229     virtual void *getFieldStructPointer(void *object, int field, int i) = 0;
